item.title: Four teams boast six players each for Pro Bowl
item.description: The Ravens, Broncos, 49ers and Seahawks each led the way with six players each selected for the Pro Bowl Games, announced Tuesday.

item.title: Sources: NBA eyes new ways to combat tanking
item.description: The NBA has begun to gather input from its owners and GMs on new ways to combat tanking, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Vikes' McCarthy out with hairline fracture in hand
item.description: Vikings quarterback J.J. McCarthy has a hairline fracture in his right hand and will be sidelined for Thursday's Christmas Day game against the Lions,...

item.title: Browns won't activate QB Watson from PUP list
item.description: The Browns will not activate quarterback Deshaun Watson from the physically unable to perform list.

item.title: Rozier lawyers move to dismiss betting charges
item.description: Terry Rozier attorneys say the government overstepped when it accused his client of wire fraud stemming from his alleged involvement in a sports betti...
